name: places/ChIJ0dLHf4xYwokR8qBN5VD-H8E
formattedAddress: 12 W 72nd St, New York, NY 10023, USA
adrFormatAddress: 12 W 72nd St, New York, NY 10023, USA

originalText.text:
I went to Dr. Weinstein for the first time this month. The prior practice I went to for 30 years kept changing and new doctors every couple years.  I was a bit wary of going to a new practice.

Dr. Weinstein and the entire staff were great! She spent time with me and let me ask questions and she listened! It was really nice to have an stress-free experience.

originalText.text: This week was my first time meeting Dr Weinstein. She was very kind and just exuding warmth and calmness about her. It’s my first pregnancy and she spent a lot of time with me and answer my list of questions. The office is down some flight of stairs so I hope in the future my belly and I can waddle down. But I look forward to more appointments with her.

text.text: This week was my first time meeting Dr Weinstein. She was very kind and just exuding warmth and calmness about her. It’s my first pregnancy and she spent a lot of time with me and answer my list of questions. The office is down some flight of stairs so I hope in the future my belly and I can waddle down. But I look forward to more appointments with her.

originalText.text: Dr Weinstein is absolutely wonderful. She is patient, calm and cares about her patients.

text.text: Dr Weinstein is absolutely wonderful. She is patient, calm and cares about her patients.

originalText.text: Dr. Weinstein is absolutely amazing and so wonderful! So glad I decided to switch my care over to her during my pregnancy. She has great bedside manners and she listened to each and every one of my concerns and answered every single question I had and made me feel at ease and comfortable. Best and most special part is that she delivered my baby boy!

text.text: Dr. Weinstein is absolutely amazing and so wonderful! So glad I decided to switch my care over to her during my pregnancy. She has great bedside manners and she listened to each and every one of my concerns and answered every single question I had and made me feel at ease and comfortable. Best and most special part is that she delivered my baby boy!

originalText.text:
I have been seeing Dr Weinstein for about 3-4 yrs and she has consistently been compassionate, caring and a great listener. She takes the time to hear my concerns and offer advice (with options) and overall she‘s just a really nice person who always makes me feel comfortable. I fully trust what she tells me and I always feel better after a visit. She has excellent follow through and I always hear back from her quickly after test results come out (in an email through the portal); these things are time consuming for doctors but I always appreciate the time she takes to write them out as it makes me feel cared for.

The nurses in the practice are also wonderful, and I have squeezed more nurses’ hands during procedures than I care to admit.

The office runs like clockwork, I’ve never had to wait more than a couple of minutes, and yet I have never felt rushed during a visit.

I can’t recommend Dr Weinstein enough! She’s wonderful!
